title: Pattern-Based Educational Technology Design: Theory and Practice

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: A blended learning environment utilizing learners’ personal devices, considering diverse linguistic and cultural backgrounds.

learning_goals: Learners explain pattern-based approaches in educational technology design and apply them to practical cases
Learners model instructional design using ProcessPattern and ContentPattern frameworks
Learners understand and explain the integration principles between pattern-based instructional design and software architecture
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
